TwinEditor.UI.RecentFilesList

TwinEditor.UI.RecentFilesList Class Reference

RecentFilesList is a bounded list that realized a most recently used list (MRUList). More...

void Add (string filename)

Detailed Description

RecentFilesList is a bounded list that realized a most recently used list (MRUList).

void TwinEditor.UI.RecentFilesList.Add ( string  filename  ) 

Adds the given filename to the recent files list. Removes previous occurence if necessary and place new filename at the beginning of the list.

Parameters:
filename The filename of the file to be added as recent file
